Since this is the second question that's really more about C#
programming t=
han NEAT, please tell me if it's inappropriate to ask on
this forum...

If =
not, however, I have a question about the Form1.CS code...
basically I'm tr=
ying to loop through repeated experiments
automatically, son in the UpdateG=
uiState() function, in the case "case
SearchStateEnum.Paused:" where the Re=
set button is re-enabled, I have
added a line "btnSearchReset.PerformClick(=
);" to reset the programming
so I can move on to my next experiment.

The p=
roblem is that while this works 90% of the time, sometimes the
program re-e=
nables the Reset button after an experiment and just hangs
there instead of=
 performing the click event and moving on to the next
experiment.  Because =
of this, I can't set up a long series of
experiments and walk away assured =
that they will all be completed.

Does anyone know a more bulletproof way t=
o get the sharpNEAT gui to
automatically click the Reset button after it en=
ables at the
completion of an experiment?

Thanks in advance,
Matt
